title: Yes, Virginia, there is a Santa Claus
creator_credit: Wolper Productions, Bill Melendez, Mort Green and Tom Keegan
brief_description: The story of eight-year-old Virginia O’Hanlon who tries every source to find out if there really is a Santa Claus and finally writes to the editor of the New York Sun for her answer. Suitable for primary level.
